text: PERSICO Marine, part of Persico Group was set up in 1990. The company builds custom sailing yachts for racing teams and individual customers. "Wally 145" by Persico Marine The group has worked on racing yachts for the America's Cup, the Volvo Ocean Race and the Maxi 72 class, amongst others. title: Persico Marine
